forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 83. South southwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
